titles.title: Lakefront Properties Tenant Protection Act
A bill to prohibit the displacement of the residents of the Lakefront Properties in Chicago, Illinois.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/1/1988--Introduced. Lakefront Properties Tenant Protection Act - States that the rehabilitation of the Lakefront Properties in Chicago, Illinois, shall be carried out in accordance with a specified memorandum of accord entered into by the Chicago Housing Authority and the Lakefront Community Organization.
